edu.cmu.tetrad.search

Class Cci

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.tetrad.search.Cci

  • public final class Cci
extends Object
    Checks conditional independence of variable in a continuous data set using a conditional correlation test for the nonlinear nonGaussian case.
    Author:
    Joseph Ramsey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cci(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix data, List<String> variables, double alpha)
      Constructs a new Independence test which checks independence facts based on the correlation data implied by the given data set (must be continuous).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      double getQ() 
      boolean independent(double[] x, double[] y) 
      boolean isIndependent(String x, String y, List<String> z) 
      double[] residuals(String x, List<String> z)
      Calculates the residuals of x regressed nonparametrically onto z.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cci

        public Cci(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix data,
           List<String> variables,
           double alpha)
        Constructs a new Independence test which checks independence facts based on the correlation data implied by the given data set (must be continuous). The given significance level is used.
        Parameters:
        data - A data set containing only continuous columns.
        alpha - The alpha level of the test.

    • Method Detail

      • isIndependent

        public boolean isIndependent(String x,
                             String y,
                             List<String> z)
        Returns:
        true iff x is independent of y conditional on z.

      • getMinP

        public double getMinP()
        Returns:
        the minimal p value calculated by the method for the most recent independence check.

      • getQ

        public double getQ()

      • independent

        public boolean independent(double[] x,
                           double[] y)
        Returns:
        true just in the case the x and y vectors are independent, once undefined values have been removed. Left public so it can be accessed separately.

      • residuals

        public double[] residuals(String x,
                          List<String> z)
        Calculates the residuals of x regressed nonparametrically onto z. Left public so it can be accessed separately.

        public double calculateFdrQ()
